1.heading: Did you know...
1.question: that back in 2015 there was the first official NFT called Etheria on Ethereum?

2.heading: Did you know...
2.question: that the first 'NFT-like' standard on Kusama is literally just byte strings?

3.heading: Did you know...
3.question: that KodaDot has started as a rewrite of React-based DotApps dashboard into Vuejs?

4.heading: Did you know...
4.question: that KodaDot is building an experimental NFT landscape called MetaPrime?

5.heading: Did you know...
5.question: that there is so much psychedelic and trippy NFT artwork? We do not know either.

6.heading: Can you guess...
6.question: how many parachains KodaDot does support? Get the exact answer on our Discord!

7.heading: Can you guess...
7.question: how many GitHub forks the KodaDot repository has?

8.heading: Can you guess...
8.question: how many GitHub stars the KodaDot repository has?

9.heading: Do you think ...
9.question: KodaDot should launch its own $koda token?

10.heading: Can you guess...
10.question: how many NFTs KodaDot is indexing from all parachains?

11.heading: Did you know...
11.question: that KodaDot has a mobile app?

12.heading: Did you know...
12.question: that KodaDot was among the first NFT galleries supporting augmented reality for 3D objects, back in early January 2021?

13.heading: Did you know...
13.question: that KodaDot had fuckups during its early days? Yeah, all startups go through failures to learn from mistakes. That's how we knew that our product is getting better.

14.heading: Did you know...
14.question: that KodaDot has its core values and ethos being distributed, decentralized and community-owned? Try participating in our ever-growing community!

15.heading: Did you know...
15.question: that KodaDot has replaced three of its logos in one month?

16.heading: Did you know...
16.question: that KodaDot's community translations was greatest growth hack for building community to participate?

17.heading: Did you know...
17.question: that KodaDot had 420 Discord members on their investors pitch deck? What a coincidence.

18.heading: Did you know...
18.question: that KodaDot's founders encourage forking its codebase and welcome more KodaDot instances in the wild?

19.heading: Did you know...
19.question: that one of KodaDot's founders was running an infrastructure for eSports back in 2006?

20.heading: Did you know...
20.question: that these facts don't even matter? We just love to spend time with you till your action is finalized into Blockchain.

21.heading: Don't forget to...
21.question: drink enough water to stay hydrated!

22.heading: Did you know...
22.question: that we've more than 500 opened issues in our backlog on GitHub?

23.heading: Did you know...
23.question: that KodaDot promotes an inclusive culture to be welcoming for a wide spectrum of artists that contribute to its growth?

24.heading: Did you know...
24.question: that if you make a pull request on KodaDot's repository, your fun fact can be shown here?

27.heading: Did you know...
27.question: that the first version of KodaDot looked worse than Craiglist in 1999?

28.heading: Did you know...
28.question: that KodaDot's founders won a few Ethereum and Polkadot hackathons in the past?

29.heading: Did you know...
29.question: that KodaDot had to lay off few dozens investors interested in backing us?

30.heading: Did you know...
30.question: that KodaDot cares about Climate change by planting trees in Portugal, called KodaForest?

31.heading: Did you know...
31.question: that the founders of KodaDot believe in simulated reality?

33.heading: Did you know...
33.question: that people from all over the world contribute to our codebase?

34.heading: Did you know...
34.question: KodaDot has offset 10,000 kilograms of CO2, which is equivalent to 2,500 cheeseburgers.

35.heading: Did you know...
35.question: that you can get an overview of all available shortcuts by pressing '?'

36.question: KodaDot has added support for Basilisk NFT marketplace recently?

37.question: KodaDot will be adding auctions for Basilisk NFT marketplace?

38.question: KodaDot Guild Rewards has distributed over $180k in bounties to contributors for their activity?

39.question: you can get paid for contributing to KodaDot?

40.question: KodaDot has over 70+ contributors to the codebase? You can fact-check this on KodaDot Github.

41.question: Kodadot Github repository has crossed 200 forks?

42.question: contributors to KodaDot already made more than 1500 pull requests? You can create one too!

43.question: you can be a member of the QA guild to help us with the quality of KodaDot releases and get paid?

44.question: you can be a member of KodaDot Ambassadors program and help us with various tasks?

45.question: you can be a member of the code review guild to help us with the code quality of KodaDot and get paid?

46.question: KodaDot is doing a bi-weekly recap called Meta Hours on KodaDot progress?

47.question: KodaDot team is working to support MoonRiver and MoonBeam ?

48.question: KodaDot team is working to support Astar and Shiden?

49.question: KodaDot was the first unofficial Kusama explorer? We hack fast.

50.question: KodaDot team is creating their own NFT protocol called Reactive NFTs? You can find a recording of the presentation on Youtube.

51.question: contributed to KodaDot discord discussions already?

52.question: which parachain KodaDot will support next?

53.question: how many guilds KodaDot has to keep the current pace of development?

54.question: when KodaDot Github repository will cross 1k stars?

55.question: KodaDot has produced most favourite open-source in Polkadot after Parity, MoonBeam, Acala and Astar?

56.question: KodaDot is becoming ultimate public good of Polkadot?

57.question: KodaDot team thought about making own parachain? wyt?

58.question: KodaDot had all-time-high 270 pull-requests in February 2022?

59.question: KodaDot have HQ in Slovenia, Europe?

60.question: you can help KodaDot resolve few issues and get paid?

61.question: you can help KodaDot report bugs and get paid?

62.question: KodaDot had all-time-high 20 contributors in one month? Will you help us to set a new record?

63.question: KodaDot contributors are doing payout by themselves from KodaDot Guild Rewards?

nft.creativeDrop: Drop your NFT here, click to upload or paste the image from the clipboard. AI model limits our support for Creative Minting to only JPEG, PNG, GIF or BMP image files. 1.title: How to Name your NFTs
1.content:
instructions:
* **File Name:** the file name of your assets should be **numeric** and **consecutive**
 e.g.
 * '1.png', '2.png', '3.png', or
* 'awesome_art_1', 'awesome_art_2' and so on...

2.title: description for your NFTs
2.content:
Each NFT has a name, description and price.
You can prepare this up front in a separate file
so that you don’t have to do it manually for all of your NFTs.

Instructions:
* File type: .TXT, .JSON or CSV

3.title: You need to have A collection
3.content:
In order to use the Mass Mint feature **you need to have an NFT collection created**
to which you will mint all of your NFTs.

If you don’t have a collection created yet, you will be able to create one in the Miss Mint.

massmint.uploadzipTip: Compress your Art files into a .ZIP file.
